description:
小编导读：作为普通人的我们，度假的话，想到哪里去哪里，可如果是英国的皇家成员呢？他们出去玩耍的话老不自由啦，还要提前报备，事后还要曝光，但凡没做好事前事后工作，就要挨批了，那么这次威廉王子和凯特王妃到底去哪儿度假了呢，下面来爆料~~

Their aides bizarrely refused to say where the royal family had stayed during their secret holiday, other than to say it was in the French Alps.But MailOnline can now reveal that the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge have enjoyed their break in the pretty Alpine village of Courchevel.除了公布这对皇室成员“秘密假期”期间去了法国阿尔卑斯山外，他们的助理们拒绝透露威廉夫妇假期期间在哪里逗留。但每日邮报在线可以向你爆料：剑桥公爵和公爵夫人很享受他们在阿尔卑斯村（位于库尔舍维勒）的假期。

A tourist officer worker said they ‘believed’ William and Kate were there, while locals said the couple were seen lunching at a local mountain restaurant. 旅游局的一位工作人员说，他们相信威廉王子和凯特王妃曾经光临过这里；有当地人说，他们看见王子王妃在当地一家山间饭店享用午餐。

The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge invited just one photographer to capture their first family holiday with Prince George, two, and ten-month-old Princess Charlotte.威廉王子和凯特王妃只邀请了一个摄影师为他们的第一次家庭旅行拍照，照片中有2岁的乔治小王子和10个月大的夏洛特小公主。

The royal couple, pictured throwing the snowballs, would not reveal where they went on holiday with their children.图中的俩人玩起了打雪仗，但是仍没透露他们度假的地点。

Prince William, seen holding his ten-month-old daughter to the camera.Charlotte at just ten months old of course won't exactly be hitting the slopes, but Kate and William had ensured their youngest wasn't going to catch a cold in the French Alps in this little snowsuit.图中的威廉王子将女儿举到了镜头面前，只有十个月大的小公主当然不可能踩着滑板去滑雪啦。虽然小公主身穿可爱的迷你滑雪服，还在法国阿尔卑斯山度假，但威廉夫妇还是小心翼翼地确保小公主不会感冒。

Sources say the couple have been keen to introduce their children to the slopes as soon as possible in the hope that they will inherit their love of the sport.有消息称，这对夫妇很迫不及待地想将他们的孩子带到滑板上，希望孩子们可以继承夫妇俩对运动的热爱。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 一家四口激萌！威廉凯特带儿女滑雪享天伦

description:
1. act 行为/举止

例：active、action、activate

2. cap 罩着/盖着

例：capable、capacity、capacious

3. ceive 做(事情)

例：conceive、perceive、receive、deceive

4. cess 行走

例：access、recess、recessionary

5. cide 切割

例：decide、incidence、accident

6. cite 呼叫，驱策

例：recite cite excite

7. com/con/co 合在一起

例：cooperation、collaboration、company、conform

8. counter 相对的

例：counterstrike (C.S.)、counterpart

9. de 往下

例：decline、decide、department

10. dem/demo 人/人民

例：democracy

11. dict/dic 说话

例：predict、dicionary、dedicate、addict

12. dis 距离/分开

例：distance、disinterested

13. dom 领域

例：dominate、predominate、domain、kingdom

14. e 往外(也可做为单词结束标志)

例：evoke、eject、emit

15. epi 之上/之中

例：epilog、epidemic

16. evit 生命

例：longevity、inevitable

17. ex 往外

例：exit、excit、external

18. fend 遮挡物

例：defend、offend

19. fer 拿

例：prefer、infer、defer、confer

20. fess 说话

例：confess、profess
